City Council Meeting Information | City of Freeport, TX












City Council Meeting Information | City of Freeport, TX

![](https://cdn.userway.org/widgetapp/images/body_wh.svg)

![Spinner: White decorative](https://cdn.userway.org/widgetapp/images/spin_wh.svg)

[Alert : Cold Weather Alert Freezing Temperatures Possible
---------------------------------------------------------

A significant cold weather system is expected to impact the Freeport area beginning tonight and continuing through early next week.What to expect:Freezing temperatures beginning tonight, with hard freezes expected Sunday night and Monday night, and another freeze possible Tuesday nightDangerous wind chills, especially with strong north windsFreezing rain possible late tonight through Sunday, which may create icy conditions on bridges, overpasses, and elevated roadsStrong winds (25&ndash;35 mph) may increase the risk of weather-related power outagesSome areas may remain below freezing for extended periods, allowing icy conditions to persistSafety precautions:Protect exposed pipes (drip faucets, open cabinets where appropriate)Bring pets indoors and protect sensitive plantsLimit time outdoors and dress in warm layersUse caution when traveling, especially late tonight and SundayCheck on elderly neighbors and those without adequate heatCity updates will be posted as conditions develop.](https://www.freeporttx.gov/cold-weather-alert-freezing-temperatures-possible)

[View All](https://www.freeporttx.gov/alerts)

Mayor & Council
===============

Mayor & Council

|  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mayor of Freeport | Mayor | Jerry Cain | [jcain@freeporttx.gov](mailto:jcain@freeporttx.gov?subject=Web%20Inquiry) |
| Councilmember | Ward A | Jeff Pena | [jpena@freeporttx.gov](mailto:jpena@freeporttx.gov?subject=web%20inquiry) |
| Councilmember | Ward B | Jarvis Davis | [jarvis.davis@freeporttx.gov](mailto:jarvis.davis@freeporttx.gov) |
| Councilmember | Ward C | George Matamoros | [gmatamoros@freeporttx.gov](mailto:gmatamoros@freeporttx.gov) |
| Councilmember | Ward D | Winston Rossow | [wrossow@freeport.tx.us](mailto:wrossow@freeporttx.gov?subject=Web%20Inquiry) |

The City of Freeport operates under the Council/Manager form of government. City Council consists of a mayor and four council members and are elected on a "ward" system. City Council meets every first and third Monday of each month at 6:00 p.m. in the council chambers in the first floor of the police department. The meetings are open to the public and you are invited to attend.

Operating under a Home Rule Charter and the Council/Manager plan, the City Council is the legislative body of your city government. The City Council appoints the City Manager who is responsible for the general administration of the City on a daily basis. The City Council appoints the City Attorney, Police Chief and Municipal Judges. Council also appoints the members of all the various boards and commissions, who volunteer their time and energy to the City.
